title: LF Top Laner TeGC
body:
Hey there, we are looking for a new top laner for our TeGC team.

Bronze-Silver ELO.

Must know matchups fairly well, and have at least basic knowledge of the game.

We have a coach.

Leave your application below.

-------------------------------

Summoner Name:
SoloQ Rank:
Flex Rank:
Best 5 Top Champions:
Why do you want to join a team?:

--------------------------------

replies.body:
Birt
gold 5
bronze 2
renekton, teemo, pantheon, garen, nautilus
seems like a fun thing to do.
How long have you been playing top lane?

DiannaAgron
Unranked
Unranked
Anything but the latest 10 champions. Was plat 2, haven't played for a season
Sounds like fun
